mapper.select: SELECT meetingId, meetingTitle, meetingDescription, startTime, endTime, organizer, state FROM meeting
SELECT meetingId, meetingTitle, meetingDescription, startTime, endTime, organizer, state FROM meeting WHERE meetingId = #{meetingId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO meeting (meetingTitle, meetingDescription, startTime, endTime, organizer, state) VALUES (#{meetingTitle}, #{meetingDescription}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{organizer}, #{state})
